scripts.bot:eval:recommended: ts-node scripts/botEval.ts --scenario ts-todo-oracle --model qwen2.5-coder:14b --plannerModel deepseek-r1:8b --reviewerModel qwen2.5:3b --jsonRepairModel qwen2.5:7b --maxIterations 6 --timeoutSec 1200
scripts.bot:eval:recommended:batch: ts-node scripts/botEvalBatch.ts --runs 3 --scenarios ts-todo-oracle,node-api-oracle,python-ai-stdlib-oracle --model qwen2.5-coder:14b --plannerModel deepseek-r1:8b --reviewerModel qwen2.5:3b --jsonRepairModel qwen2.5:7b --maxIterations 6 --timeoutSec 1200 --hardTimeoutSec 1200
